attributes.description: type name so that messages of the same type will replace each other

attributes.name: hint_target
attributes.description: entity id that the hint should display at

attributes.name: hint_timeout
attributes.description: how long in seconds until the hint automatically times out, 0 means never

attributes.name: hint_icon_onscreen
attributes.description: the hint icon to use when the hint is onscreen. e.g. "icon_alert_red"

attributes.name: hint_icon_offscreen
attributes.description: the hint icon to use when the hint is offscreen. e.g. "icon_alert"

attributes.name: hint_activator_caption
attributes.description: the hint caption that only the activator sees e.g. "#YouPushedItGood"

attributes.name: hint_color
attributes.description: the hint color in "r,g,b" format where each component is 0-255

attributes.name: hint_icon_offset
attributes.description: how far on the z axis to offset the hint from entity origin

attributes.name: hint_range
attributes.description: range before the hint is culled

attributes.name: hint_binding
attributes.description: bindings to use when use_binding is the onscreen icon

attributes.name: hint_allow_nodraw_target
attributes.description: if false, the hint will dissappear if the target entity is invisible

attributes.name: hint_nooffscreen
attributes.description: if true, the hint will not show when outside the player view

attributes.name: hint_forcecaption
attributes.description: if true, the hint caption will show even if the hint is occluded

attributes.name: hint_local_player_only
attributes.description: if true, only the local player will see the hint

attributes.name: hint_name
attributes.description: The hint to stop. Will stop ALL hints with this name

attributes.name: hint_player
attributes.description: entity id that the hint will display for

attributes.name: hint_target
attributes.description: entity id that the hint should display at

attributes.name: map
attributes.description: Current Map (If official, it shows the title of the map)

events.name: vote_started
events.note: Called when a vote has started

attributes.name: maxargs
attributes.description: Amount of arguments for the vote

events.name: vote_ended
events.note: Called when a vote has ended

attributes.name: target
attributes.description: player who got targeted by the caller

events.name: badge_reward_announce
events.note: Called when the player is notified about receiving a badge reward.

attributes.name: entindex
attributes.description: player who got the badge reward
